children.content: Well, see you later. Please, hurry up.
Then, you can use your "A" and "D" keys to pivot on yourself. It's pretty much it.
First, you can use the "W" and "S" keys  to go forward and backward.
Your memory core seems pretty damaged. do you need a reminder how to move?
I need your help. Just go further into the cave in front of you. I have a gift for you, if that can motivate you.
